title: V  A  P  O  R  W  A  V  E
description: Given a string, remove all spaces from the string, then insert two spaces between every character and uppercase all letters.

tests.text: vaporwave('hello world') should return a H E L L O W O R L D.
tests.testString: assert.strictEqual(vaporwave('hello world'), 'H  E  L  L  O  W  O  R  L  D');

tests.text: vaporwave("hello world") should return H E L L O W O R L D.
